sn35.106:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the origin and ending of suffering.
sn35.106:1.3: And what, mendicants, is the origin of suffering?
sn35.106:1.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.106:1.5: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.106:1.6: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.106:1.7: This is the origin of suffering …
sn35.106:1.11: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts.
sn35.106:1.12: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.106:1.13: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.106:1.14: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.106:1.15: This is the origin of suffering.
sn35.106:2.1: And what is the ending of suffering?
sn35.106:2.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.106:2.3: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.106:2.4: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.106:2.5: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn35.106:2.6: When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases.
sn35.106:2.7: When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
sn35.106:2.8: When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
sn35.106:2.9: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn35.106:2.10: This is the ending of suffering. …
sn35.106:2.12: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.106:2.13: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.106:2.14: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.106:2.15: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn35.106:2.16: When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases.
sn35.106:2.17: When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
sn35.106:2.18: When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
sn35.106:2.19: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn35.106:2.20: This is the ending of suffering.”
